com.alexdiru.redleaf

Class DataNote

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.alexdiru.redleaf.DataNote
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<DataNote>

    public class DataNote
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<DataNote>
    Represents a note which appears on a song i.e. falls down from the top of the screen and the player must tap it
    Author:
    Alex

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean mBeingHeld
      If a hold note, whether the note is being held down
      int mBottomY
      Stores the pixel position of the bottom of the note when it is being rendered
      private int mEndTime
      The millisecond time at which the note (if hold) ends in the song
      private static Rect mHoldLineRect
      Only need one rectangle to share between all of the notes

      Store the pixel position of the left of the note when it is being rendered

      The pixel height of each note
      private int mPosition
      The position at which the note appears - left, centre left, centre right, right

      • drawHoldLine

        private void drawHoldLine(Canvas canvas,
                Paint held,
                Paint unheld,
                int noteX,
                float songSpeed,
                int currentTime)
        Draws the hold line for the note (if applicable)
        Parameters:
        canvas - The canvas to draw to
        held - The paint to draw the hold line if the note is being held
        unheld - The paint to draw the hold line if the note is not being held
        noteX - The x position to draw the hold line at
        songSpeed - The speed of the song
        currentTime - The current time the song is at
